channel.title: Services on CapitalMu
channel.description: Recent content in Services on CapitalMu

item.title: Technology Assistance
item.description: We provide a wide range of blockchain related technology services, and we are also willing to received customized services for our clients. Delegate Agency We help other delegates maintain their nodes: [1] 24/7 technical support[2] Solid techincal team to ensure the operation[3] Real-time report including various indicators for Node[4] 99.9% server up time with server failover, won’t miss any block[5] Close collaboration with IoTeX team, kept up to date with latest development and upgrades

item.title: OTC Trading
item.description: We provide Block Trade for IOTX (OTC market) most cost efficient solutions transparent for trading details customized services based on your needs IOTX OTC Trading Guideline —— Faster + Easier Drop an email to admin@capitalmu.com: tell us your BUY/SELL amount and expected price Exchange address via social media: Telegram/Wechat/WhatsApp/etc. Small amount trial transaction Left balance transaction Send confirmation email for this OTC transaction to you Done!

item.title: IoTeX Delegate
item.description: CapitalMu is IoTeX’s strategic partner and academic collaborator, our university-based research and devlopment team is committed to contribute to IoTeX community diversity and ecosystem maturity. Who are we? We are a research team based in the National University of Singapore, consists of professor, financial industry practitioner, lecturer, researcher, and developers. Our main research and development interests are: Quantitative Finance: Market Sentiment Analysis, Machine learning and AI, Algorithmic trading strategies, derivative products, on both traditional financial market and cryptocurrency Blockchain Technology and Its Applications: Token economics, Blockchain applications in financial industry and emerging markets, Blockchain technology for a smart nation, where IoT plays an extremely critical role.
